TopicTitle: Inspiration Sarnus - a probe lander mission to Tekto [OPM]

Articles.Content:
Hello folks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

In anticipation for 1.0 release, I've decided to set up a short series of missions to the outer planets of the Kerbol system - Duna, Jool and Sarnus. The Duna and Jool missions' reports can be found as Imgur albums [here](http://imgur.com/a/tgdp8#0) and [here](http://imgur.com/a/O3bRa#0) respectively, but what I really wanted to share is my first actual attempt at a KSP video. Hope you'll enjoy! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nwI0nJ_OYBA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T01:52:08Z" title="05/02/2015 01:52  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Astraph**
  
Finally managed to paste the Youtube link correctly ^^'
